entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider removing out-of-proc hosting model for IIS in 7.0 #40863
  • Updating Blazor Server app in IIS causes exception when calling ProtectedLocalStorage #40862
  • 2FA sign in only returns locked out after n+1 failed attempts #40860
  • Razor Component weird namespace issue #40861
  • Response content type in custom exception middleware - serialization for Json and XML #40857
  • Add a `CreatedAtRoute` result for multiple routes #40856
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM: Blazor.start() promise does not resolve on certain errors #40855
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception #40854

Closed

  • File nesting: include rules in NuGet packages or as project items #40652
  • Blazor - Error Boundary not triggered inside of EditForm Component #40649
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Dependency] Bump version support for Swashbuckle in templates #40778
  • Blazor - Ambiguous/Duplicate routes for _Host when updating Razor.RuntimeCompilation package to v6.0.3 #40742
  • Hot reload doesn't work on F5 but works when run `dotnet watch` #40502
  • Blazor Server: hang when circuit disconnects #40814
    6.0.x
  • [Question] How does ProducesResponseType inference work for ActionResult<T>? #38108
    Discussions
  • Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'blazorExtensions.WriteCookie' ('blazorExtensions' was undefined). #40744
  • Passing tab character to API returns bad request #40495
  • .net 7 is on ubuntu 21.10 and libmsquic on 20.04 http3 #40679

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't use yarn.msbuild SDK in source-build #40864
    area-blazor
  • [6.0] Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40859
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK, Unquarantine tests #40858
    area-infrastructure
  • Included githubactions in dependabot config #40851
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Forward Port Update MAUI Exception Handling (#40765) to `main` #40842
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/ProjectTemplates/test #40850
    area-mvc, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/ProjectTemplates/BlazorTemplates.Tests #40849
    area-mvc, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Allow leading CR/LF in HTTP request lines in Kestrel #40833
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #40848
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in /src/Components/Web.JS #40847
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Issue/31962 #40841
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security
  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40840
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Prevent razor pages from being packed in UI nupkg #40839
    area-identity
